name: Android Tool Kit
body:
### The tool you need!!!

This started as a small project back last year with my DNA which then evolved into just a big tool. I wanted this to become big and more useful and maybe it will! I'll actually work on this time to time and others can help too.
```
You don't need to do anything special
Just download a release and use
If there is bugs, report! 
```

### Helping out

If you want to help out with ATK just submit a pull request BUT in case coding isn't your thing then sharing the word helps. Thats about it thx

### Contributors
a
Currently as of 6/20/14 8:56pm I've been the only one working on this, but this has work from others as well. I'll end up putting thanks here soon, no worrys.

### Contact

If you ever want to contact me for some reason, the best bet is twitter ([@covxx](https://twitter.com/covxx) always). I have an XDA,g+,facebook,myspace,reddit, and everything else but twitter is still the best way to contact me. Oh you could email me too @ covenant123dx @ gmail.com

### Thanks
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
